text: The body's defense mechanism is a system that protects us from harmful invaders like bacteria, viruses, fungi, and other pathogens that can cause illness. It functions to detect and eliminate these threats to maintain our health. This defense system is often referred to as the immune system, and it has several layers of protection that work together.
